original_text: Moses had teachers who taught him all the wise things that the Egyptians knew. He learned how to speak well. He could also do powerful things.
korean_text: 모세가 애굽 사람의 모든 지혜를 배워 그의 말과 하는 일들이 능하더라

sentences.original_text: who taught him all the wise things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그에게 모든 지혜로운 것들을 가르쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: He learned how to speak well
He could also do powerful things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 강력한 일들을 할 수 있었습니다
